captions.text:
Here's a neat little party trick that's guaranteed
to be a blast, and all you're gonna to need
is a bottle of soda.

The next time you're at a house party, there's
a good chance that someone will show up, with

some bottles of soda. Now if a bottle gets
shaken up, it's going to take awhile to open,

unless, or course, you don't mind making a
mess all over the place. But check this out.

When you master the soda ninja swipe, you'll
blast the cap off with incredible power, and

did you notice the soda isn't spilling over?
Instead, it creates a cool misty vapor that

gently flows out the top and over the sides.
The pressure in the bottles is enough to ricochet

the cap off the ceiling, and all the way across
the room. You can be sure you'll get some

attention, because everyone will be looking
around, to see what just exploded. If we mark

the bottle, and slowly unscrew the cap, you
can see it takes about one and a half rotations

to fully release. I measured that distance,
on a paper plate, and it's roughly 6" of travel,

or about 15.5 cm. Now the trick to an instant,
deCAPitaion, is to start with your middle

finger on the side of the cap, then roll it
down to your wrist in one swift, and fluid

motion. It might take a couple of tries to
get a feel for it, but just focus on swiping

the cap down to your wrist. Now the next time
you're at a party and you see someone pouring

themselves a drink, just hang tight until
the bottles, are half empty. Now make sure

the cap is on tight, and shake it like a maniac
to build up the pressure. Give it a few seconds

for the bubbles to settle back down again,
then slowly unscrew the cap, until you hear

a hiss. Back it off just a touch, and now
your bottle blaster, is charged and ready

to fire. Grab the bottle by the neck, line
up the cap, and unleash the power. Not only

does this look awesome, but the sudden bang
will make people jump. Now if you misjudge

the carbonation in the bottle, and it starts
foaming over, just slap your hand down over top,

and pretend nothing ever happened. Well now
you know, how to turn a house party refreshment,

into a soda bottle blaster, that will probably
leave your drinks a little flat, but will

definitely make you, the center of attention.
Well that's it for now. If you liked this

video, perhaps you'll like some of my others.
Check them out at www.thekingofrandom.com

comments.author: wemikan

comments.text:
1. Take a small water bottle and lose some of the air in it
2. Twist the bottle more than 10 times in the middle
3. put your thumb over the cap and push down while swiping to the right( 
left depending on the type of bottle)
4. It might make a popping sound or the cap will blast off!
(If you can't get it to work, try step one with the same bottle again or 
get a different bottle)﻿

comments.author: sando nero

comments.text:
Actually it's quite simple. Get a eco-friendly water bottle, put about 1-2 
tbsp. of water inside, press a little bit of air out of bottle, put on top, 
twist the entire bottle into two sections (keep on doing this until you 
physically can't or around 15 twists), then pop off top like in video or 
use thumb. Try it. It works!
comments.author: Alexander L

comments.text:
Liar the only reason there is smoke and the pop sound is because its SODA. 
The pressure built inside when you shake it makes the pressure go up, 
making the popping sound. You could have done it with a regular one, but 
it's the same as opening it normally

comments.author: PartygodJake

comments.text:
I tried this today and failed pretty hard. I had too much soda in the 
bottle and I underestimated the amount of pressure I'd need to open the 
top. When it came out it was a gyser all over paperwork and laptops. I was 
so surprised by it that I didn't put my hand over the top and just ran to 
the sink with it.

Still pretty awesome but the cleanup part was lame. I'd recommend 
practicing this one a few times first. Also make sure you have a tight grip 
on the top of it or it will be very hard to get the cap off.﻿

comments.text:
You can easily do this with your thumb too! You twist the cap once shaken 
until you hear a hiss. Don't screw the cap back but instead place your 
thumb against the cap with your other hand holding the bottle below the 
neck and push the cap forward with your thumb as hard as possible. I 
sometimes aim them at my mates ass and he gets a massive shock when the cap 
hits.﻿
